name: Airbyte
headline: Open Data Movement Platform
description:
Airbyte is the leading open data movement platform that empowers data teams in the AI era by transforming raw data into actionable intelligence. With the largest catalog of over 350 connectors, it offers low-code, no-code, and AI-powered connector development, and provides flexible deployment options across self-hosted, cloud, and hybrid environments. 

https://github.com/airbytehq/airbyte

founders.name: John Lafleur, Founder
founders.description:
- Co-founder of Airbyte, the leading open-source data integration platform. 
- Serial entrepreneur (3 startups incl. 2 acquired and 1 failure),
- 10+ years been developing strong teams building successful products
- Big believer in people, data and telling a story.
- Love building new products with the right GTM and messaging. But love even more building and growing teams that do so.
- Write for SDTimes, TheNewStack, Linux.com, DevOps.com, Dzone, Product Coalition...

founders.name: Michel Tricot, Co-Founder & CEO
founders.description:
Co-founder & CEO of Airbyte.

I’ve been working in data since 2007. In 2011 I join LiveRamp where I was Head of Integrations and Director of Engineering. My team built and scaled over 1,000 data ingestion and distribution connectors to replicate hundreds of TB of data every day. 

After LiveRamp’s acquisition and later IPO (NYSE:RAMP), I joined rideOS as Director of Engineering, again deep in data. There, I realized that all companies are trying to solve the same problem.

Airbyte was born.

## The Airbyte Open Data Movement Platform
### Accelerate AI innovation
Speed up AI application deployments with data integration from all your sources to your vector databases, without sacrificing data privacy or control.
### Democratize data access 
Empower your organization to sync data and build new connectors to cloud or intelligence platforms using no-code or low-code.
### Optimize data operations 
Streamline your data operation and AI approach with optimal security and governance, creating an efficient and trusted data infrastructure.
## Address all your custom connector needs
Leverage the largest catalog of 550+ open-source **structured and unstructured** data sources. Join 2,000 + data engineers who built more than 10,000+ custom connectors in minutes with low-code/no-code, or AI Connector Builder.
[Check out the Connector Builder](https://airbyte.com/</product/connector-development-kit>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605e01bc25f7e19a82e74788/66f1bee4fed8345f48d2836a_address-custom-connector-needs%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605e01bc25f7e19a82e74788/66edacdadff87f05a287d5dd_make-genAI-workflows-trustworthy.png)
## Make your genAI workflows trustworthy
Simplify your AI workflows by loading unstructured data directly into popular vector store destinations like Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus and more. Airbyte boosts your Gen AI application accuracy and efficiency by leveraging RAG, vector databases, and unstructured data integration.
[Explore the AI use cases](https://airbyte.com/</product/ai>)
## Manage your pipelines your way
  * [UI](https://airbyte.com/</gated-demo>): Create connections and custom connectors in minutes.
  * [API](https://airbyte.com/<https:/reference.airbyte.com/reference/getting-started>): Programmatic interactions, data syncing, and embedded connectors.
  * [Terraform](https://airbyte.com/<https:/registry.terraform.io/providers/airbytehq/airbyte/latest>): Integration with CI/CD tools and rapid deployment with Infrastructure as Code.
  * [PyAirbyte](https://airbyte.com/<https:/docs.airbyte.com/using-airbyte/pyairbyte/getting-started?_gl=1*wfj1yn*_gcl_au*NzAzNTU4MzA5LjE3MjA0NTAyNzc.>): Build LLM applications with Python libraries, SQL tools, and AI frameworks.


[Check out our demo app](https://airbyte.com/</gated-demo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605e01bc25f7e19a82e74788/66edaca5a9bc0477d5f7e1a0_manage-pipelines.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605e01bc25f7e19a82e74788/66f1bf04a32f5d9036996eb4_ensure-data-security%20\(1\).png)
## Ensure data security and governance for all deployment models
  * Flexible deployment options: **self-hosted, cloud, and hybrid.**
  * Secure and compliant: ISO 27001, SOC 2, GDPR, HIPAA, data encryption, audit/monitoring, SSO, RBAC, and more.
  * Centralized multi-tenant management with self-serve capabilities.


[Learn more about Airbyte Enterprise](https://airbyte.com/</product/airbyte-enterprise>)

## The Airbyte Open Data Movement Platform
### Accelerate AI innovation
Speed up AI application deployments with data integration from all your sources to your vector databases, without sacrificing data privacy or control.
### Democratize data access 
Empower your organization to sync data and build new connectors to cloud or intelligence platforms using no-code or low-code.
### Optimize data operations 
Streamline your data operation and AI approach with optimal security and governance, creating an efficient and trusted data infrastructure.
## Address all your custom connector needs
Leverage the largest catalog of 550+ open-source **structured and unstructured** data sources. Join 2,000 + data engineers who built more than 10,000+ custom connectors in minutes with low-code/no-code, or AI Connector Builder.
Check out the Connector Builder⟨47⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605e01bc25f7e19a82e74788/66f1bee4fed8345f48d2836a_address-custom-connector-needs%20\(2\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/605e01bc25f7e19a82e74788/66edacdadff87f05a287d5dd_make-genAI-workflows-trustworthy.png)
## Make your genAI workflows trustworthy
Simplify your AI workflows by loading unstructured data directly into popular vector store destinations like Pinecone, Weaviate, Milvus and more. Airbyte boosts your Gen AI application accuracy and efficiency by leveraging RAG, vector databases, and unstructured data integration.
Explore the AI use cases⟨48⟩
## Manage your pipelines your way
  * UI⟨49⟩: Create connections and custom connectors in minutes.
  * API⟨50⟩: Programmatic interactions, data syncing, and embedded connectors.
  * Terraform⟨51⟩: Integration with CI/CD tools and rapid deployment with Infrastructure as Code.
  * PyAirbyte⟨52⟩: Build LLM applications with Python libraries, SQL tools, and AI frameworks.

generated_description:
Airbyte is an innovative data integration company that’s making waves in the open-source community since its founding in 2020. As a member of Y Combinator's W20 batch, Airbyte has quickly established itself as a leader in the open data movement, offering a platform that transforms raw data into actionable insights. 

At its core, Airbyte champions the mission of democratizing data access, emphasizing the data movement necessary for organizations to thrive in the AI era. They provide a platform with over 350 connectors and versatile deployment choices—whether it's self-hosted, on the cloud, or hybrid. This flexibility caters to a wide range of organizational needs without sacrificing control or security.

With a solid team of around 90 people based in San Francisco, Airbyte combines low-code and no-code solutions for data teams, alongside AI-powered development tools. Their offerings include Airbyte Cloud, which is fully managed and gets you up and running in minutes, and Airbyte Open Source, which has already seen adoption by over 40,000 companies.

Airbyte’s product capabilities are impressive—ranging from reliable database and API replication to AI-ready data for embedding in applications. They offer tools for building custom connectors swiftly, and they support developers with resources like PyAirbyte, a library that brings Airbyte's capabilities to Python developers.

Their community is thriving, with over 20,000 members actively leaning on one another for insights and support. Companies like TUI and Cart.com have praised Airbyte for significantly speeding up their data operations and allowing them to focus on delivering value instead of infrastructure concerns.

If you’re looking to enhance your organization's data capabilities, Airbyte is definitely worth a look. They might just have the tools you need to streamline your workflows—all while being part of the exciting open-source ecosystem. 

For more information, check out their official site at [Airbyte.com](https://airbyte.com/) or explore their software on [GitHub](https://github.com/airbytehq/airbyte).
